snippet.title: Dino Gun Gameplay
snippet.description:
Gameplay footage from the SAGE 2022 version of Dino Gun.

Inspired by the children’s game cops and robbers, players can either be the gunner or the runners. The gunner has to shoot all the runners before a set amount of seconds while the runners can earn points for every second they are alive. The runners can also pick up items mid game which can help the runners survive longer. Each player does become the gunner at least once. Once all the rounds are finished, the player with the highest amount of points wins.

Itch page: https://tobintojo.itch.io/dino-gun
